page.title: 14THE PEOPLE OF SELSEY
page.content: The population of{Selsey}is about {9000},a large village.We had a small survey and discovered that most people were not born in Selsey ,but in London and came down to Selsey in the last 14 years,10 years after the sea wall was built.Many people who live in Selsey are retired but there are about 1000 children at the 3 schools.The most popular reason people like Selsey is the sea, according to our survey and then the village atmosphere.The quietness is quite popular also the fresh air.The friendly Selsey people help to make people more welcome.The community spirit makes people feel happier in Selsey.Most people would not like Selsey to change but some want more opportunities for youth,no more houses,better shops,roads and jobs.
